ygData.subject: Re: Level 20 Combat Strategies
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I always slay decaying skeletons holding anything. The lowest loot you get is about 1g, and occasionally, you get rusty two-handed or long swords (5gp), or
ygData.messageBody:
According to mstokes:
> 2. I've always struggled with money. I hate camping so that leaves me with
> outdoor, wandering mobs. Well last night the gods were smiling on me. I
> walked into Northern Ro and killed a Decaying Skel holding a cracked staff,

I always slay decaying skeletons holding anything. The lowest loot you get
is about 1g, and occasionally, you get rusty two-handed or long swords (5gp),
or even a worn great staff (almost 1pp with good charisma!)

Of course, if there are newbies around, I let them go at it first. But no one
around? Grab the loot :)

> otherway started to run and saw an unlooted ghouls corpse. I waited and no one
> came to loot it so I bent down and got some serious cash and a bronze mace. In

Now *that* is a stroke of luck like I wish I had.

--
